sub_fields.label: name

sub_fields.label: columnwidth
sub_fields.name: columnwidth
sub_fields.instructions: if this block is two column with a text, the textcolumn will get this width. If this has more then two columns, the column will get this width

sub_fields.label: custom twig template block
sub_fields.name: customtemplate
sub_fields.instructions: imports a custom .twig template block from the theme folder instead of ponzoblocks plugin

sub_fields.label: slideshow
sub_fields.name: slideshow
sub_fields.instructions: if possible, create slide of cards, columns, banner images

sub_fields.label: slidesdesktop
sub_fields.name: slidesdesktop
sub_fields.instructions: set to 0 to disable slideshow in this viewport

sub_fields.label: slidesmobile
sub_fields.name: slidesmobile
sub_fields.instructions: set to 0 to disable slideshow in this viewport

sub_fields.label: link visual
sub_fields.name: linkvisual
sub_fields.instructions: show call to action button within visual instead of within textbox

sub_fields.name: buttonoutline
sub_fields.instructions: line button only

sub_fields.label: buttonsize
sub_fields.name: buttonsize
sub_fields.instructions: m : normal

sub_fields.label: buttontext
sub_fields.name: buttontext

sub_fields.label: visualbg
sub_fields.name: visualbg
sub_fields.instructions: breaks out the visual as a wallpaper within the block

fields.label: selectedcategories
fields.name: selectedcategories
fields.instructions:
Choosing from the same post_type will filter exactly
Choosing from multiple post_types will filter all

fields.label: slideshow
fields.name: slideshow
fields.instructions: turn this block into a slideshow

sub_fields.label: anchor id
sub_fields.name: anchor_id
sub_fields.instructions:
create an (unique within the same page) anchor ID for this block.
You can refer from other blocks by typing in the same value as this ID in the field anchor link, within tab 'links'

sub_fields.label: anchor link
sub_fields.name: anchor_link
sub_fields.instructions: type the anchor link that refers to the anchor id from another block

fields.label: columns per row
fields.name: cpr
fields.instructions: columns per row (or slides per row)

fields.label: theme icons
fields.name: pb_theme_icons

adds icons to (link) buttons in ponzoblocks builder, paste filenames of icons like:
b_youtube.svg
b_variety.svg
b_apple.svg
